verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the mountain of joy,
In the valley of tears
I will love You, I will trust You
When the flamme's burning bright,
When I'm weary and dry
I will love You, I will trust You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my strength and you are my
song
Giving me hope and guiding me on

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And at all times I will sing of Your greatness
And at all times I will sing of Your love
And at all times I will sing of Your faithfulness
For Your goodness remains
And Your love is the same at all times

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When Your guidance is clear,
When I can't see ahead
I will love You, I will trust You
In the summer of life,
In the soul's darkest night
I will love You, I will trust You

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You are my strength and you are my
song
Giving me hope and guiding me on
